name: CinemaRoom
0:
”Alexa, open Cinema Room and tell me if it is open”
”Alexa, open Cinema room and show schedule”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cinema room
des: This skill provides the user with a schedule for the cinema room and the current state (open or closed).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
